definition: important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
"Collection of the Most Important Military Techniques", book published in 1044 during the Northern Song Dynasty

sentences.english: I am a European, and one returns to one's roots .
sentences.chinese: 我是個歐洲人，總要葉落歸根。

sentences.english: She had too little faith in mankind not to know that they were erring .
sentences.chinese: 她對男人們沒有信心，知道他們總要犯錯誤的。

sentences.english: So then, let us not be like others, who are asleep, but let us be alert and self-controlled.
sentences.chinese: 所以我們不要睡覺，像別人一樣，總要儆醒謹守。

sentences.english: Others are chock full of loans, which must be re-paid.
sentences.chinese: 而有些呢，全部是貸款，總要還的。

sentences.english: The new thing's appearance must have the running-in period.
sentences.chinese: 新事物的出現總要有磨合期。

sentences.english: There is no end to what the children want to know; they always like to demand the how and why.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們的求知慾是無止境的，他們凡事總要尋根究底。

sentences.english: Before each meal my father or mother would say a prayer of thanks.
sentences.chinese: 喫飯前父親或母親總要作謝飯禱告。

sentences.english: It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune must be in want of a wife.
sentences.chinese: 有錢的隻身總要娶位太太，這是全球公認的真理。

sentences.english: The prices of fruit generally run up during the winter months.
sentences.chinese: 水果的價格在冬季幾個月裏一般總要上漲。

sentences.english: I'm sick of13 having something to do all the time and all I really want is to have some time of.
sentences.chinese: 我厭煩總要做這做那，我想要的就是有自己的時間。

sentences.english: Even now, he will play catch till his whole shoulder gives out.
sentences.chinese: 現在，他還玩傳球遊戲，而且總要玩到整個肩膀發酸。

sentences.english: Therefore let us not sleep, as do others; but let us watch and be sober.
sentences.chinese: 所以我們不要睡覺，像別人一樣，總要儆醒謹守。

sentences.english: It is not that you are just vegetating.
sentences.chinese: 總要有些時刻，沒有語言，你只是存在着。

sentences.english: The coach is always gloomy when the team loses a game.
sentences.chinese: 球隊一輸球，教練總要繃起臉來。

sentences.english: For what make people be again harmed dead by the childe after producing good will to the some role?
sentences.chinese: 爲啥總要讓人對某角色產生了好感後再被公子害死？
